mapper.update: update wtm_task_pool pool set pool.totalScore =#{score} where pool.id=#{taskId}

update wtm_task_pool pool set pool.isPublishNow = 1 where pool.id IN
#{item}
mapper.select: select p.id taskId,p.taskType,p.totalScore,p.singleScore,p.isPublishNow,a.title articleTitle,p.createTime,p.needNumber,floor(p.totalScore/p.singleScore) AS remainNumber, CASE WHEN unix_timestamp(now())-p.createTime>p.limitDay*24*60*60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isAccessUndercarriage, CASE WHEN unix_timestamp(now())-p.createTime>p.limitDay*24*60*60 THEN 0 ELSE p.limitDay*24*60*60-unix_timestamp(now())+p.createTime END AS remainDays from wtm_task_pool p LEFT JOIN wtm_article a ON a.id=p.articleId LEFT JOIN wtm_official_accounts account ON account.id=a.officialAccountId WHERE account.id>0 AND p.id>0 AND a.id>0 AND account.id=#{officialAccount} AND p.taskType=1 order by p.createTime desc

select p.id taskId,p.taskType,p.totalScore,p.singleScore,p.isPublishNow,p.createTime,p.needNumber,a.userName articleTitle,floor(p.totalScore/p.singleScore) AS remainNumber, CASE WHEN unix_timestamp(now())-p.createTime>p.limitDay*24*60*60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isAccessUndercarriage, CASE WHEN unix_timestamp(now())-p.createTime>p.limitDay*24*60*60 THEN 0 ELSE p.limitDay*24*60*60-unix_timestamp(now())+p.createTime END AS remainDays from wtm_task_pool p LEFT JOIN wtm_official_accounts a ON a.id=p.officialAccountsId WHERE p.officialAccountsId=#{officialAccount} order by p.createTime desc
select * from wtm_task_pool pool WHERE pool.articleId=#{articleId} AND pool.isPublishNow=#{isPublishNow}

select a.url,a.imageUrl,a.title,a.articleAbstract,a.createTime,pool.id poolId from wtm_article a LEFT JOIN wtm_task_pool pool ON pool.articleId = a.id WHERE pool.isPublishNow=0 AND pool.totalScore>=pool.singleScore AND pool.totalScore>0 AND pool.id>0
